Package org.ginsim.gui.graph

Interface GraphGUI<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the vertex V
    E - the edge E
    G - the graph
    All Superinterfaces:
    SavingGUI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseGraphGUI, CanvasGraphGUIImpl
    public interface GraphGUI<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends SavingGUI
    Deal with the GUI view of a graph: get a component, provide access to selected items and view options.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi
